Class DesktopGraphics

java.lang.Object
  edu.neumont.csc415.DesktopGraphics

public class DesktopGraphics
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
stevehalladay Graphics context for users of Desktop. This class wraps the Graphics2D class so as to limit functionality.
